full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 338 Filed 10/12/21 Page 5 of 22 united States 397 U.S. 112, 114-15 (1970) ("A limitation carving out an exception should apply to cases shown to be clearly within its purpose.") Congress' purpose was to extend the limitation period for Rape, and assault to commit Rape, where the United States had jurisdiction of these offenses. Only this explains the need for 18 U.S.C ยง3297 which is purposely not retroactive. To have made it retroactive would have violated Stogner v. California, because Chapter 77, 117, and 110 were not previously included. For these reasons David A. Dieni should be granted intervenor status, and the enclosed brief should be filed in the Maxwell's Case styled above. David A. Dieni, 5324018 Federal Correctional Complex USP Coleman II PO Box 1034 Coleman, FL 33521 David A. Dieni David A. Dieni 8-4-2021 DOJ-OGR-00005183
